website_summaries.verdict: These vibrant hopper balls are great for indoor use, but might not hold up as well outside.
pros: Cute print is gender-neutral and appeals to kids of all ages
Holds up to 170 pounds and accommodates kids of varying age groups
Comes with a 60 day money back guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for my Granddaughter with Autism 💙💛❤️
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful I got 2 it for my granddaughter for her birthday One for her house and one for my house, She turn 11 year old. She has Autism, loves to run and jump All day long. She 89 lbs and it’s fine, I’m 189 lbs and I was fine also, great for outdoors and indoors. She like to sit on it just to hand out ❤️💛💙
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun indoors.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 9 year old love them. We have a big house, so they bounce everywhere on these things. They have not been outdoors on them, so I’m not sure how they’ll handle a small rock or scuffing on cement. The size is perfect for my 7 year old, but a little small for the 9 y.o. (We are a tall family). I inflated it with my yoga ball hand pump. It comes with a spare plug to seal the opening. Overall great fun, but going to have to find a bigger size for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Coocoomunga

customer_reviews.title: Super bouncy and really durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my son for Christmas. (It's always more fun to have a buddy to bounce with.) They have been such a hit around the house. They are extremely bouncy. We used to have a similar product in a small child version, but these are much more beefy and bouncy. My boys fly all over the house in them. They've been bouncing nonstop, which is great. The noise may be a little annoying, but they are getting exercise which is especially great in the cold winter months when they are inside a lot. I highly recommend this product. It's a great old-school, type toy any kid would love and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My two boys (age 9 and 6) are pretty rough and they have held up well to their playing. We have a blue one and an orange one and they are slightly different in size and feel, but have both kept up quite well to their rough housing. They have used them primarily indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The two balls we bought have been so well loved that the neighbors have asked for them as birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third ball we bought! The two balls we bought have been so well loved that the neighbors have asked for them as birthday gifts for their kids. Easy to inflate, take a beating and are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: toni f

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a energetic child, he/she will absolutely love this. My kid has so much fun bouncing on this thing
customer_reviews.author: Donavan Alika Parsons

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: I have a highly active autistic child. He loves to bounce. This is our first time trying this. I got it for Christmas thinking he would be able to burn off extra energy. It's great. I am 5'7 145 lbs, and I can bounce around on it. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Everything it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: So, we bought this for our 8 year old, incredibly energetic and autistic grandson. This thing is awesome! He can bounce and be rough, grandpa can bounce and be rough...the whole family can use it! It is super sturdy material and very large! We ordered the blue....we did receive item a week late though
customer_reviews.author: Kendra K

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, but didn't cost much
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 orders of these and they were all destroyed in a couple days. They are fine for indoor and smooth concrete, but will not service anything minor rock or stick. They all tore very quickly when used in a little corral area we set up outside with hay bales surrounding it. We also bought another brand of bouncers which all survived.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan A Hutzler

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke for my teenage son. Turns out many families members have had fun bouncing on this silly thing. It is very sturdy, good for a laugh and fun!
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bouncing fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun watching the kids learn to hop. They caught on fast. Used mostly in the house, fairly good sized, the kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson says it’s the best gift he got! His sisters now want one each for their birthdays!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Popped in 3 mins
customer_reviews.text: This product ripped within the first 3 mins and it was used inside the house so nothing sharp would have popped it. It was not blown up too much and it was used by an 8 year old child. It is definitely not worth the money. I wouldn’t pay a dollar for it.
customer_reviews.author: yankees86

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great item, a lot more durable than expected. This thing got beat up, by my son, my wife and myself. Def recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joell Almighty

customer_reviews.title: Quick ship and great ball
customer_reviews.text: Showed up quick and its great. Nice and bouncy. Holds up 180 pounds with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Shawn abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors
customer_reviews.text: My son is autistic and needs to jump as a sensory need. This ball is great for when it's too hot or cold outside. Will definitely be getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: Fun bouncing ball
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 10 year old grandson for Christmas. So far he loves it and has named it Mr. Snuffy. My only complaint is that it looses air and we have to continually add air so that he can bounce. Other than this inconvenience t seems to hold up well to his bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves it! It’s definitely great to keep him busy while you’re working from home! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect thing for getting the wiggles out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 7'th birthday and it was the biggest hit! He used it non-stop for a MONTH...until I stuck it in his closet that I didn't notice the plastic covering over the end of a metal shelf had come off and it poked a hole right through. :( Tears. It was totally my fault and he misses it so as soon as it becomes available we will buy another one...probably two so his siblings will stop fighting to use his! It's the perfect thing for getting the wiggles out!
customer_reviews.author: E. Weist

customer_reviews.title: Active fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and I do too. Fun way for him to exercise
customer_reviews.author: Momma V

customer_reviews.title: Burns off kid energy fast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for boys who are 4, 7 and 8. These made great gifts the boys loved. Got them outside burning off all that excess energy while strengthening muscles and bones. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy the blue ball - wrong size
customer_reviews.text: We received the orange ball last week and it was so great that I immediately ordered the blue one as well. But it's a LOT smaller. Despite the fact that both boxes say 22 inches on the back, the blue ball is clearly not the same size. I inflated them both with the same pump, so that's not the issue. I even returned the smaller ball, just got the second blue one - small again! Kids are super disappointed, mom is frustrated, won't be buying those again...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: but that didn't stop her having fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 2&half yr daughter..she loves hopping on it;) it's still a little big for her right now even though my daughter is a tall 2yr old..but that didn't stop her having fun with it;) great product! Very cute
customer_reviews.author: YYQ

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the older kids. Mine is 8 and weighs 62 height 52”
customer_reviews.author: Nickelknack

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ball is well done, quality wise. Needs a pump to blow it up, you will not be able to blow it up with your lungs, this is expected for any exercise or jump ball like this one. No abnormal plastic smell. Kids love it. Disclosure: We got it at a heavy discount to evaluate this product.
customer_reviews.author: WiseCrunch

customer_reviews.title: Popped after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Popped after only a few uses. Was not over inflated (was still under 22 inches) and was not used on any rough surfaces, just carpet. I felt the thickness of the latex rubber material was alittle on the thinner side after inflating it, so was worried it wouldn't last long and I was right.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Novoa

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Got for a Christmas present for my 6 year old. He seriously loves it. They have been bouncing all around the house. My 8 year old is jealous and wants one for her birthday now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great fun toy! My kids are having lots of fun with it. Great customer service, I had an issue and they took care of it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Great for Burning Up Energy!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old son’s favorite energy burner this winter!! This is a fairly standard hopper ball. So far, with lots of use, it hasn’t popped yet. It has been a treasure for burning pent up inside winter energy!!
customer_reviews.author: janejolene

customer_reviews.title: Good product, seems pretty tough
customer_reviews.text: Good product, my kid loves it. It's supposed to be good for up to 170 lbs, which I doubt, but never tried it with someone that big. It looks like it has staying power, which is good for my 8-year old, who is a little tough on things. I would recommend it for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Normska

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stands up to rough play!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, easy to inflate and all my kids have fun with it. Sturdy and well made! My 7yr old twins have bounced on this to no end and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids & mommy loved it
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids and mommy loved it they bounce all over the place a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: gas

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy piece of crap. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today. My daughter bounced on it for about 30 minutes and then, a hole was made in it. Not an easily patched hole, a HOLE. Don’t buy it. It’s crap.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Harmann

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my 4 year old. Him and his friends love it. Great quality. The only thing I would change is I saw others that came with an air pump, which would be convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for my 8 and 9 year olds. I have tried it myself and I am 5' 7 about 160! these are a lot of fun and great quality! every kid should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Mina Romina

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: This had a small hole when it arrived and wouldn’t hold air. Complete garbage. We have three other hopper balls that are not this brand and this is the first we’ve had an issue with. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hopping balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these balls for my grandchildren and we love them. Found them to be very durable and sturdy. I also used them as part of an obstacle course for 12 active Cub Scout boys. They loved them as well. Would recommend these balls to anyone. They keep the family active for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Janese Stewart

customer_reviews.title: To small.
customer_reviews.text: Too small for taller kids to use. I bought it for my kids weight 80 lbs but it was too small for her too read.
customer_reviews.author: Sarith Reuben

customer_reviews.title: My foster kids love these. The play on them all the time
customer_reviews.text: My foster kids love these. The play on them all the time. They are holding up to a lot of abuse (fun) on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Gonna need another one!
customer_reviews.text: My kids fight over this at 8. I should just buy another one...so much fun they have. Durable and well made
customer_reviews.author: Nirac

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for each of my children and 1 popped on 1st use. The 2nd popped on 3rd use.
customer_reviews.author: C.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. It's the smooth kind made for softer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. It's the smooth kind made for softer surfaces. I let my kids use it inside and on my deck. When the grass starts growing again I've the yard with no sticks. My 6 year old uses this to get the extra energy out. She now quietly bounces instead of running around the house. Best idea ever.
customer_reviews.author: SewMarci

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old & 9 year old LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Watch them burn energy!
customer_reviews.text: I laugh so hard watching our four kids bounce circles around the first floor. Got them each one for Christmas. Already paid for themselves in amusement and energy spent.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson with lots of energy.
customer_reviews.text: Truly enjoy this, he is always using my balance ball. Now he has one of his own.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Bounce bounce ~ fun
customer_reviews.text: This ball is so fun ! Made stronge and provides hours of entertainment . I also use it as my exercise ball . Gives a great workout if used properly .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best gift for a 6yo ADHD boy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift for a 6yo ADHD boy. He hops around and it uses up some of his energy. I bought 2 more for the other kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopping Ball is a Bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old grandson loved this Hopping Ball so much! We sent it as an early Easter gift. When we arrived, he was still hopping around the house! It's strong, and can even support an adult! He loved the orange, because it was his favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Catcharb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with reinforced bottom
customer_reviews.text: Good quality with reinforced bottom. My 7 yr old grandson likes this product. The 3 yr old is not quite able to use it yet without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Ulla Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Bounce!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. The kids love the size and the bounciness of the ball
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Menard

customer_reviews.title: Great activity for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a grandson as a Christmas gift! He opened it immediately Christmas evening and began bouncing on it even before it was fully inflated. Great gift for a kid to use outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy for kids and grown ups
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for kids and grown ups! My 5 year old, my 7 year old and I enjoy this ball and we got two because they are so great. You need one for every member of the family, because you are going to argue over this. Seriously. Just buy it. You will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well made
customer_reviews.text: My son (12 yrs) uses this for exercise. It lasts! I was worried it would deflate fairly quickly but we've had it since Christmas (it's now May) and it is still going strong. Fun ans easy to use. I am happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Bonus: It looks similar to one of the Pokémon characters. :)

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Hopping Ball

customer_reviews.title: Blue hoping ball
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the hoping ball my son is on it everyday. I wish the inflating directions were clearer. It does say to inflate to 22 inches buy on the blue bAll that would be flat. Where exactly should you measure the 22 inches?

customer_reviews.title: She luved it. She was always playing on my ...

customer_reviews.text: 8 year old grand daughter is still hopping happily all around the house. This present was a BIG hit! Just be sure to buy the pump too.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great buy & good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our recent camping trip. We had the kids keep the hopping balls on the 10 x 20 mat in front of the camper just in case they ran into any sharp sticks. My only issue was that the plug is a little difficult to remove when the ball is fully inflated. Thanks to some strong fingernails & a plastic knife, we were able to get the plug loose eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They both love it. It's jus the right size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids for Christmas, a 7 yr old and sensory seeking 2 yr old. They both love it. It's jus the right size for my 7 yr old who is 52 inches tall. With near daily use, mostly indoors, it still looks brand new and I have only had to put air back in it once.
customer_reviews.author: D1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: My kid had this for less than a day before it popped. Not worth the purchase. Highly disappointed 2 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: the grandkids have a lot of fun on the balls. the only little problems is when they sit for a period of time(a week or longer) I have to put more air in them. other than that, they're a good product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
